00026 ExtractIntercalibrationProcessor::ExtractIntercalibrationProcessor() :
00027   marlin::Processor("ExtractIntercalibrationProcessor") {
00028  
00029   _description = "Jara 2010/12/15: Processor extracting Intercalibration constants from ahcPmLed & ahcCmLed - runs";
00030 
00031   registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionName",
00032                              "Name of the input collection",
00033                              _inColName,
00034                              string("CALDAQ_ADCCol"));
00035 
00036   registerProcessorParameter("ConditionsCollectionName",
00037                              "Collection of AhcConditions objects",
00038                              _condColName,
00039                              string("AhcConditions"));
00040 
00041   registerProcessorParameter("MappingProcessorName",
00042                              "Name of the MappingProcessor",
00043                              _mappingProcessorName,
00044                              string("AhcMappingProcessor"));
00045 
00046   registerProcessorParameter("OutputFileName",
00047                              "ASCII file to write results",
00048                              _outFileName,
00049                              string("intercalibration.dat"));
00050 
00051 }

00059 
00060 void ExtractIntercalibrationProcessor::init() {
00061   printParameters();
00062   
00063   std::stringstream message;
00064   message << "undefined conditionsdata: ";
00065   bool error = false;
00066 
00067   /*-------------------------------------------------------------*/
00068   _ahcMapper = dynamic_cast<const AhcMapper*>(MappingProcessor::getMapper(_mappingProcessorName));
00069   if ( ! _ahcMapper ) {
00070     message << "MappingProcessor::getMapper("<< _mappingProcessorName
00071             << ") did not return a valid mapper." << endl;
00072     error = true;
00073   }
00074   
00075   if (error) {
00076     streamlog_out(ERROR) << message.str();
00077     throw marlin::StopProcessingException(this);
00078   }
00079   /*-------------------------------------------------------------*/
00080  
00081   _ahcMaxNumberOfModules  = _ahcMapper->getMaxModule();
00082   _ahcMaxNumberOfChips    = _ahcMapper->getMaxChip();
00083   _ahcMaxNumberOfChannels = _ahcMapper->getMaxChannel();
00084   _ahcMaxNumberOfCells    = _ahcMaxNumberOfChannels * _ahcMaxNumberOfChips;
00085   _mapperVersion = _ahcMapper->getVersion();
00086 
00087   cout <<"Init: Max number of Modules="<<_ahcMaxNumberOfModules
00088        <<" Chips="<<_ahcMaxNumberOfChips
00089        <<" Channels="<<_ahcMaxNumberOfChannels
00090        <<" Cells="<<_ahcMaxNumberOfCells
00091        <<endl;
00092   cout <<"Mapper version is "<<_mapperVersion
00093        <<endl;
00094 }

00103 void ExtractIntercalibrationProcessor::updateMapper() {
00104   _ahcMaxNumberOfModules  = _ahcMapper->getMaxModule();
00105   _ahcMaxNumberOfChips    = _ahcMapper->getMaxChip();
00106   _ahcMaxNumberOfChannels = _ahcMapper->getMaxChannel();
00107   _ahcMaxNumberOfCells    = _ahcMaxNumberOfChannels * _ahcMaxNumberOfChips;
00108   _mapperVersion          = _ahcMapper->getVersion();
00109 
00110 }

00117 /******************************************************************/
00118 
00119 void ExtractIntercalibrationProcessor::processEvent(LCEvent* evt) {
00120   if (_mapperVersion != _ahcMapper->getVersion()) {
00121     streamlog_out(DEBUG0) <<" Mapper version changed..."<<std::endl;
00122     this->updateMapper();
00123     
00124     cout <<"updateMapper: Max number of Modules="<<_ahcMaxNumberOfModules
00125          <<" Chips="<<_ahcMaxNumberOfChips
00126          <<" Channels="<<_ahcMaxNumberOfChannels
00127          <<" Cells="<<_ahcMaxNumberOfCells
00128          <<endl;
00129     cout <<"Mapper version is "<<_mapperVersion
00130          <<endl;
00131   }
00132  
00133   int eventNumber = evt->getEventNumber();
00134 
00135 
00137 
00138   LCCollection *condCol = 0;
00139   LCCollection *inCol = 0;
00140 
00141   try {
00142     condCol = evt->getCollection(_condColName);
00143   }
00144   catch (DataNotAvailableException err) {
00145     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"Collection "<< _condColName<<" not found in event "
00146                  <<eventNumber<<"-- skipping event\n"<<endl;
00147     return;
00148   }
00149 
00150   try{
00151     inCol = evt->getCollection(_inColName);
00152   }
00153   catch (DataNotAvailableException err) {
00154     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"Collection "<< _inColName<<" not found in event "
00155                  <<eventNumber<<"-- skipping event\n"<<endl;
00156     return;
00157   }
00158 
00159 
00160   streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"\n\n Collection "<<_condColName<<" has "<<condCol->getNumberOfElements()
00161                <<" elements"<<std::endl;
00162  
00163 
00165  
00166   for (int i = 0; i < condCol->getNumberOfElements(); i++) {
00167     AhcConditions *cond = dynamic_cast<AhcConditions*>(condCol->getElementAt(i));
00168     if (cond == NULL) {
00169       streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"Collection "<<_condColName
00170                    <<" does not contain AhcConditions objects -- skiping event"<<endl;
00171       return;
00172     }
00173     
00174     bool isValid = false;
00175     unsigned int mod = _ahcMapper->getModuleFromModuleID(cond->getModuleID(), isValid);
00176     if (!isValid) continue;
00177     condpoint newpoint;
00178     newpoint.vcalib = cond->getVcalib();
00179     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"Vcalib: "<<cond->getVcalib()
00180                  <<" module: "<<mod
00181                  <<endl;
00182       
00183     if ( (eventNumber%1000) == 0) {
00184       cout <<"Event="<<eventNumber
00185            <<" Vcalib: "<<cond->getVcalib()
00186            <<" module: "<<mod
00187            <<endl;
00188     }
00189       
00190     for (int j = 0; j < 12; j++) {
00191       newpoint.shiftreg[j] = cond->getSR(j);
00192       //streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"   shift register: "<<cond->getSR(j)<<endl;
00193     }    
00194     _cond[mod] = newpoint;
00195   
00196   }
00197 
00198   streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"\n\n Collection "<<_inColName<<" has "
00199                <<inCol->getNumberOfElements()<<" elements"<<endl;
00200 
00201 
00203 
00204   unsigned short cell = 0;
00205   
00206   for (int i = 0; i < inCol->getNumberOfElements(); i++) {
00207     LCObject *obj = inCol->getElementAt(i);
00208     AdcBlock adcBlock(obj);
00209       
00210     short crate   = adcBlock.getCrateID();
00211     short slot    = adcBlock.getSlotID();
00212     short fe      = adcBlock.getBoardFrontEnd();
00213     short channel = adcBlock.getMultiplexPosition();
00214 
00215     for (unsigned short chip = 0; chip < _ahcMaxNumberOfChips; ++chip) {
00216       bool isValid;
00217       const int daqChannelID    = _ahcMapper->getDecoder()->getDAQID(crate, slot, fe, chip, channel);
00218       const unsigned int module = _ahcMapper->getModuleFromDAQID(daqChannelID, isValid);
00219       if ( ! isValid ) continue;
00220           
00221       cell = chip * 18 + channel;
00222       assert( (module < _ahcMaxNumberOfModules) && (cell < _ahcMaxNumberOfCells));
00223   
00224       float ampl = (float)adcBlock.getAdcVal(chip);
00225   
00226       unsigned vc = _cond[module].vcalib;
00227       unsigned sr = _cond[module].shiftreg[chip];
00228           
00229       if (sr==472) {
00230         //streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" sr="<<sr<<" vc="<<vc<<std::endl;
00231         _data[daqChannelID][vc].sumCm += ampl;
00232         _data[daqChannelID][vc].sum2Cm += (ampl*ampl);
00233         _data[daqChannelID][vc].nCm += 1;
00234 
00235       } else if (sr==1375) {
00236         //streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" sr="<<sr<<" vc="<<vc<<std::endl;
00237         _data[daqChannelID][vc].sumPm += ampl;
00238         _data[daqChannelID][vc].sum2Pm += (ampl*ampl);
00239         _data[daqChannelID][vc].nPm += 1;
00240       }
00241           
00242     } /*end loop over chip*/
00243 
00244     
00245   } /*------------------ end loop over AdcBlocks ----------------*/
00246 
00247 }
00248 
00249 
00250 /******************************************************************/
00251 /*                                                                */
00252 /*                                                                */
00253 /*                                                                */
00254 /******************************************************************/
00255 
00256 void ExtractIntercalibrationProcessor::end() {
00257 
00258   FILE * pFile;
00259   pFile = fopen (_outFileName.c_str(),"w");
00260 
00261   streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"\n\n\n Open file "<<_outFileName<<endl;
00262 
00263   for (map<unsigned, map<unsigned, datapoint> >::const_iterator iterOut = _data.begin(); 
00264        iterOut != _data.end(); iterOut++) {
00265     
00266     map<unsigned, datapoint> cmap = (*iterOut).second;
00267     const int daqChannelID = (*iterOut).first;
00268     bool first = true;
00269     double pedPm = 99999;
00270     double pedCm = 99999;
00271     double sumw = 0, sum = 0, sum2 = 0;
00272     int n = 0;
00273 
00274     double minIC = 0., maxIC = 0.;
00275     double maxW = 0.; 
00276     unsigned maxWvc = 0;
00277     unsigned maxn = 0;
00278     
00279     for (map<unsigned, datapoint>::const_iterator iterIn = cmap.begin(); iterIn != cmap.end(); iterIn++) {
00280       datapoint cdat = (*iterIn).second;
00281 
00282       unsigned vc = (*iterIn).first;
00283 
00284       if (cdat.nPm<100 || cdat.nCm<100) continue;
00285 
00286       streamlog_out(DEBUG1)<<"vc="<<vc<<"  --> nPm="<<cdat.nPm<<" sumPm="<<cdat.sumPm<<" nCm="<<cdat.nCm<<" sumCm="<<cdat.sumCm<<endl;
00287         
00288       if (first) {
00289         pedPm = cdat.sumPm / cdat.nPm;
00290         pedCm = cdat.sumCm / cdat.nCm;
00291         first = false;
00292       }
00293         
00294       double meanPm = -999, RMS2Pm = -999;
00295       meanPm = cdat.sumPm / cdat.nPm - pedPm;
00296       RMS2Pm = cdat.sum2Pm/cdat.nPm - (cdat.sumPm/cdat.nPm)*(cdat.sumPm/cdat.nPm);
00297 
00298       double meanCm = -999, RMS2Cm = -999;
00299       meanCm = cdat.sumCm / cdat.nCm - pedCm;
00300       RMS2Cm = cdat.sum2Cm/cdat.nCm - (cdat.sumCm/cdat.nCm)*(cdat.sumCm/cdat.nCm);
00301 
00302       streamlog_out(DEBUG1)
00303         <<"meanPm="<<meanPm<<" pedPm="<<pedPm<<" RMS2Pm="<<RMS2Pm
00304         <<" meanCm="<<meanCm<<" pedCm="<<pedCm<<" RMS2Cm="<<RMS2Cm 
00305         <<endl;
00306 
00307       double w = 0;
00308       double Ci = 0; double Pi = 0; 
00309       double eCi2 = 0;        
00310       double ePi2 = 0;
00311       double ICi = 0;
00312       
00313       if (meanPm > 200 && meanCm > 1000 && meanCm < 30000) {
00314         if (RMS2Pm>0 && RMS2Cm>0) {
00315         
00316           Ci = meanCm; Pi = meanPm; // mean values for each point
00317           eCi2 = RMS2Cm / cdat.nCm; // square of errors of averages        
00318           ePi2 = RMS2Pm / cdat.nPm; // Err = rms/sqrt(n)
00319           ICi = Ci / Pi; // IC for point = ratio of means
00320 
00321           //      w = sqrt(1./(RMS2Pm + RMS2Cm));
00322           // new counting of weights from error propagation
00323           w = 1 / (ICi * sqrt( eCi2/(Ci*Ci) + ePi2/(Pi*Pi) ));
00324 
00325           n++;
00326           sumw += w;
00327           sum  += w * ICi;
00328           sum2 += w * ICi*ICi;
00329 
00330           if (n==1) {
00331             minIC = meanCm/meanPm; maxIC = minIC;
00332             maxW = w; maxWvc = vc;
00333           } else {
00334             double tempIC = meanCm/meanPm;
00335             if (tempIC < minIC) minIC = tempIC;
00336             if (tempIC > maxIC) maxIC = tempIC;
00337             if (w > maxW) { maxW = w; maxWvc = vc; maxn = n;}
00338           }
00339         }
00340       }
00341     
00342       streamlog_out(DEBUG1)
00343         <<" ICi="<<ICi<<" eCi2="<<eCi2<<" ePi2="<<ePi2<<" w="<<w
00344         <<"  n="<<n<<" sumw="<<sumw<<" sum="<<sum<<" sum2="<<sum2
00345         <<endl;
00346     } /*------------------- end loop over iterIn Vcalib (vc)  ------------------------*/
00347     
00348     double ic = -99.9, icErr = -9.99;
00349     
00350     if (n > 0) {
00351       ic = sum/sumw;
00352       icErr = sqrt(sum2/sumw - sum*sum/(sumw*sumw));
00353       icErr /= sqrt(n);    // to get error of mean over n runs
00354     }
00355 
00356     
00357     unsigned int module  = _ahcMapper->getModuleFromDAQID(daqChannelID);
00358     unsigned int chip    = _ahcMapper->getDecoder()->getChipFromDAQID(daqChannelID);
00359     unsigned int channel = _ahcMapper->getDecoder()->getChannelFromDAQID(daqChannelID); 
00360 
00361     streamlog_out(DEBUG1)<<"   module/chip/channel="<<module<<"/"<<chip<<"/"<<channel<<endl;
00362 
00363     fprintf (pFile, " %2d %2d %2d  %7.3f %6.3f %2d  %6.2f %6.2f %5d  %2d %6.2f  %6.1f %6.1f\n",
00364              module,chip,channel,ic,icErr,n,
00365              minIC, maxIC, maxWvc, maxn, maxW, pedPm, pedCm);
00366 
00367 
00368   } /*---------------- end loop over iterOut (DAQ channels M/A/C --------------------*/
00369 
00370 
00371    fclose (pFile);
00372 }
